name: Ch.11ABaseConvo3
_source: speak;Tethys;Sir Gilliam!|You've been watching my dance practice again, haven't you?
speak;Gilliam;Tethys!|I-I was merely passing by.|On patrol.
speak;Tethys;Three times in one hour?|That's quite the thorough patrol.
speak;Gilliam;A knight of Frelia must be vigilant.
speak;Tethys;Or... perhaps...|You wanted to ask me something?
speak;Tethys;Hah!|Come now, I've seen that look before.|On many men's faces.
speak;Gilliam;I don't know what you're implying.
speak;Tethys;Love advice, Sir Gilliam.|That's what you're seeking, isn't it?
speak;Tethys;There's no shame in it.|Even the strongest knights have hearts.
speak;Tethys;Only to someone who understands the language of longing.|So, who is this lucky woman?
speak;Gilliam;I'd rather not say.|But... I could use some counsel.
speak;Tethys;And I'd be delighted to help!|First lesson, women appreciate forthrightness.
speak;Gilliam;My armor and lance are straightforward enough.
speak;Tethys;Ha ha ha!|Oh, Sir Gilliam...|Women want to know the man beneath the armor.
speak;Gilliam;What would I even say to her?|My duties leave little time for....pleasantries.
speak;Tethys;Start with a compliment.|Something sincere, about more than just appearance.
speak;Tethys;That's a beginning!|Now, flowers wouldn't hurt either.
speak;Gilliam;Flowers...|I know nothing of such things.

speak;Tethys;Trust me.|A simple wildflower picked with thought means more than the finest roses bought without care.|A wing of a beautiful bird, so show how you feel.|If she is right for you, she will appreciate what you give her.
speak;Gilliam;I...see.|I think I might know where to find some flowers.|I think I can find some wings too nearby.|There should be some in the field nearby.|I can grab some on my patrol route.
speak;Tethys;Back to the patrol, then?|Tell me how it goes, won't you?
